{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3278992,"name":"Luca Haverty","username":"LucaHaverty","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/l/8dc957/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-01-10T00:46:29.768Z","cooked":"

Hi, I’m having some trouble getting a limelight to connect. It’s brand new, and I followed all the steps on the documentation including flashing it and wiring through an Ethernet switch. After powering on the robot and connecting to it (wifi or Ethernet), the limelight finder does not detect anything.

I have tried power cycling the robot and reflashing the limelight multiple times, and different Ethernet cables. The exact same setup works for a raspberry pi running photonvision, just not for the limelight.

All of the status lights come on as well as the light in the Ethernet port.

I’ve also tried finding it with Angry IP scanner with no success.

Edit: it works! (Solution: 12v POE for the Ethernet Plugging into the limelight)
